content: A proposal from FHIR-I for FMG endorsement: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Package_IG_Release_Policy_Issue
Timeline by when endorsement is required? (Tomorrow's agenda is already tight for just an hour...)
well, I think the week after, since I won't do any package updates until the ballot opens now. But then there's a few waiting for this. Though it probably needs TSC sign off
